name: 0 : At the entrance
text: Hello there! Welcome to JK Mith! My name is Dan. An I will be your SMS assistant today. Would you like to begin with your shopping experience?

name: 1 : The first aisle
text: OK Great! So, I am at the first aisle now. We've got loads of books and thousands of movies. Which ones would you like to go through?

name: 2 : The books
text: Amazing! Based on your previous purchases we've got science fiction and comics that best match your profile. Which one do you prefer?

name: 3 : Books : Science Fiction
text: Super! That's one of my favourite genres! So the best ones we've got are: 1984 by George Orwell, Childhood's End by Arthur C. Clarke and The Time Machine by H.G. Wells. Which one are you interested in?

items.description: Among the seminal texts of the 20th century, Nineteen Eighty-Four is a rare work that grows more haunting as its futuristic purgatory becomes more real.

items.name: Childhood's End
items.description: The Overlords appeared suddenly over every city--intellectually, technologically, and militarily superior to humankind.

items.name: The Time Machine
items.description: So begins the Time Traveller’s astonishing firsthand account of his journey 800,000 years beyond his own era—and the story that launched H.G.

name: 4 : Books : Comics
text: Great, we might have something special for you... OK, so we've got V for Vendetta and The Ballad of Halo Jones by Alan Moore. What shall I pick up for you?

items.name: V for Vendetta
items.description: A frightening and powerful tale of the loss of freedom and identity in a chillingly believable totalitarian world.

items.name: The Ballad of Halo Jones
items.description: When Halo Jones grows bored with her life in The Hoop, a futuristic world where jobs are scarce and excitement is nonexistent.

name: 5 : The Movies
text: Of course! We saw that you love comedies? We have something very special for you! How does Hot Fuzz or Shaun of the Dead sound to you?

items.name: Hot Fuzz
items.description: As a former London constable, Nicholas Angel (Simon Pegg) finds it difficult to adapt to his new assignment in the sleepy British village of Sandford.

items.name: Shaun of the Dead
items.description: Shaun is a 30-something loser with a dull, easy existence. He lives with his slovenly best friend, Ed (Nick Frost), in a small flat on the outskirts of London.

name: 6 : Checkout
text: If that is everything I would pack your items and send them directly to your address. Thanks for shopping at JK Mith! Have a great day!
